column2: Objective
str
Defeat target enemies.
Obtain target items.
Eliminate target enemies.
Pursue and defeat target enemies.
Weaken target and then pacify it using <hex:02082EE4E80201FF12>the /soothe emote<hex:FF15><hex:023111FF0A>EventItem<hex:03E802020203><hex:03>.
<hex:02084FE4E80201FF1C>Attack target to reveal its<hex:FF2C>Use <hex:023111FF0A>EventItem<hex:02E802020203> to reveal target's<hex:03> true form, then defeat it.
Defeat all targets in the locations specified.
Gather all missing pages of the <hex:021A020203>Necrologos<hex:021A020103> and defeat the creature summoned from within.
Use the /beckon emote to lead <hex:023110FF09>BNpcName<hex:03E802020203> safely to the specified location.
Obtain target items.
Travel to all the specified locations and obtain the target items.
Deliver the items to the specified locations.
Levequest deemed a failure if too few items are obtained.
Survey target areas.
Lure target from hiding and slay it.
Gather all missing pages of the <hex:021A020203>Necrologos<hex:021A020103> and defeat the creature summoned from within.
Progress
Locations visited
Targets will grow frenzied if pacification is attempted too early.<hex:02100103>Levequest deemed a failure if targets accidentally killed.
Defeat <hex:023110FF09>BNpcName<hex:02E802030203> to obtain glamour-dispelling <hex:023111FF0A>EventItem<hex:02E803030203>.
Levequest deemed a failure if <hex:023110FF09>BNpcName<hex:03E802020203> is slain.
Defeat the enemies while protecting your charge.
Defeat as many enemies as possible within the allotted time.
Discover who is carrying <hex:023111FF0A>EventItem<hex:03E802030203> and slay the target.
Defeat any enemies summoning reinforcements.
Objective failed if insufficient number of enemies slain.
Slay enemies that respond to the <hex:020814E4E80202FF06>/poke<hex:FF07>/doubt<hex:03> emote and collect <hex:023111FF0A>EventItem<hex:02E803030203>.
Objective failed if all <hex:023110FF09>BNpcName<hex:02E802030203> are lost.

Use <hex:023111FF0A>EventItem<hex:04E803030203> obtained from <hex:023110FF09>BNpcName<hex:04E802030203> on <hex:02310CFF05>EObj<hex:04E804030203> to lure out <hex:023110FF09>BNpcName<hex:04E805030203>.
